documentation.short: Use this component to duty cycle the radio.
Basic implementation of a CSMA MAC for the ChipCon CC2420 radio.
The minimum number of samples that must be taken in CC2420DutyCycleP that show the channel is not clear before a detection event is issued
Implementation of the transmit path for the ChipCon CC2420 radio.
Implementation of the receive path for the ChipCon CC2420 radio.
